recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Recover your account using social verification from a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step1: Enter the phone number of the account you want to recover.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code on your screen to a trusted friend who is also a DamDoh user.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code to confirm your identity, granting you access on this new device.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Let a trusted DamDoh connection scan this temporary QR code to verify your identity.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is valid for 10 minutes.

networking.title: Global Network

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy notice for DamDoh ('we', 'us', or 'our'), describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ('process') your information when you use our services ('Services'), such as when you visit our website or our mobile application. Reading this privacy notice will help you understand your privacy rights and choices. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Services.

whatInfoWeCollect.heading: 1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
whatInfoWeCollect.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us.

howWeUseInfo.heading: 2. HOW DO WE PROCESS YOUR INFORMATION?
howWeUseInfo.content: We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent.

willInfoBeShared.heading: 3. WHEN AND WITH WHOM DO WE SHARE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
willInfoBeShared.content: We may share information in specific situations and with specific third parties, such as affiliated companies, business partners, and with your consent. For example, your public profile information is shared with other users on the platform to facilitate connections.

cookiesAndTracking.heading: 4. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
cookiesAndTracking.content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Notice.

howLongWeKeepInfo.heading: 5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
howLongWeKeepInfo.content: We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.

howWeKeepInfoSafe.heading: 6. HOW DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION SAFE?
howWeKeepInfoSafe.content: We have implemented appropriate and reasonable technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process.

minors.heading: 7. DO WE COLLECT INFORMATION FROM MINORS?
minors.content: We do not knowingly solicit data from or market to children under 18 years of age.

privacyRights.heading: 8. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
privacyRights.content: You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time. Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information under applicable data protection laws.

controlsForDoNotTrack.heading: 9. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
controlsForDoNotTrack.content: Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track ('DNT') feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. At this stage, no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online.

updatesToNotice.heading: 10. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
updatesToNotice.content: Yes, we will update this notice as necessary to stay compliant with relevant laws. The updated version will be indicated by an updated 'Revised' date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible.

contactUs.heading: 11. HOW CAN YOU CONTACT US ABOUT THIS NOTICE?
contactUs.content: If you have questions or comments about this notice, you may email us at privacy@damdoh.org or contact us by post at our office address.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to DamDoh. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of the DamDoh website, mobile applications, and services (collectively, the 'Services'), so please read them carefully.

agreementToTerms.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you don't agree to be bound by these Terms, do not use the Services.

intellectualProperty.heading: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The Services are protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries. Except as expressly provided in these Terms, we (or our licensors) exclusively own all right, title, and interest in and to the Services, including all associated intellectual property rights.

userRepresentations.heading: 3. User Representations
userRepresentations.content: By using the Services, you represent and warrant that: (1) all registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete; (2) you will maintain the accuracy of such information and promptly update such registration information as necessary; (3) you have the legal capacity and you agree to comply with these Terms of Use; (4) you are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside; (5) you will not access the Services through automated or non-human means, whether through a bot, script, or otherwise.

prohibitedActivities.heading: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: You may not access or use the Services for any purpose other than that for which we make the Services available. The Services may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us. Prohibited activity includes, but is not limited to: systematic retrieval of data, unauthorized framing of or linking to the Services, and interfering with security-related features.

platformManagement.heading: 5. Platform Management
platformManagement.content: We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to: (1) monitor the Services for violations of these Terms of Use; (2) take appropriate legal action against anyone who, in our sole discretion, violates the law or these Terms of Use; (3) in our sole discretion and without limitation, refuse, restrict access to, limit the availability of, or disable any of your Contributions or any portion thereof.

termAndTermination.heading: 6. Term and Termination
termAndTermination.content: These Terms of Use shall remain in full force and effect while you use the Services. WITHOUT LIMITING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF THESE TERMS OF USE, WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO, IN OUR SOLE DISCRETION AND WITHOUT NOTICE OR LIABILITY, DENY ACCESS TO AND USE OF THE SERVICES (INCLUDING BLOCKING CERTAIN IP ADDRESSES), TO ANY PERSON FOR ANY REASON OR FOR NO REASON.

modificationsAndInterruptions.heading: 7. Modifications and Interruptions
modificationsAndInterruptions.content: We reserve the right to change, modify, or remove the contents of the Services at any time or for any reason at our sole discretion without notice. We also reserve the right to modify or discontinue all or part of the Services without notice at any time. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the Services.

governingLaw.heading: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and defined following the laws of Cambodia. DamDoh and yourself irrevocably consent that the courts of Cambodia shall have exclusive jurisdiction to resolve any dispute which may arise in connection with these terms.

disputeResolution.heading: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: Any legal action of whatever nature brought by either you or us shall be commenced or prosecuted in the state and federal courts located in Cambodia, and the Parties hereby consent to, and waive all defenses of lack of personal jurisdiction and forum non conveniens with respect to venue and jurisdiction in such state and federal courts.

contactUs.heading: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: In order to resolve a complaint regarding the Services or to receive further information regarding use of the Services, please contact us.

termsOfService.conclusion: To resolve a complaint or get more information, please {contactLink}.

about.title: About DamDoh
about.subtitle: Connecting the agricultural world, from seed to shelf.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower every stakeholder in the agricultural supply chain with the technology and network to build a more sustainable, equitable, and efficient food system for the world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We envision a globally connected agricultural ecosystem where data flows freely and securely, waste is minimized, quality is guaranteed, and every participant, from smallholder farmers to global consumers, thrives.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.content: Promoting practices that are environmentally sound and economically viable for future generations.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: Fostering a connected community where knowledge and opportunities are shared freely.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: Leveraging technology to solve the most pressing challenges in agriculture.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: Building trust through transparency, data security, and ethical business practices.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.content: Providing tools and resources that give every stakeholder agency and control over their business.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.intro: We are a diverse team of technologists, agronomists, and supply chain experts passionate about revolutionizing agriculture.
team.member1Bio: Visionary leader with 20+ years in sustainable agriculture and technology.
team.member2Bio: Expert in building scalable, secure platforms for global impact.
team.member3Bio: Renowned soil scientist and advocate for regenerative farming practices.

careers.title: Careers at DamDoh
careers.subtitle: Join us in building the future of agriculture.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, you'll be part of a mission-driven team dedicated to making a tangible impact on global food systems. We offer:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: A collaborative and innovative work environment.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Opportunities for professional growth and learning.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: The chance to work on technology that matters.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: A culture that values diversity, inclusion, and sustainability.

job1.title: Senior Backend Engineer (Logistics)
job1.description: Design and build scalable microservices to optimize agricultural supply chain logistics, from first-mile aggregation to international shipping.

job2.title: Lead Product Manager (FinTech)
job2.description: Drive the product strategy for our financial services module, including digital wallets, credit scoring, and insurance integrations.

job3.title: Field Operations Lead (Cambodia)
job3.description: Lead our on-the-ground efforts in Cambodia to onboard farmer cooperatives, processing units, and logistics partners to the DamDoh platform.

noOpenings.title: No Openings At The Moment
noOpenings.content1: We are always looking for talented individuals passionate about our mission. If you believe you can contribute to our team, feel free to send your resume and a cover letter to {emailLink}.

communityGuidelines.title: Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Fostering a respectful, professional, and collaborative environment.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to the DamDoh community! Our platform is built on trust and mutual respect. To ensure a positive and productive experience for all 21 stakeholder types in our diverse ecosystem, we ask that you adhere to the following guidelines:

respectful.title: Be Respectful and Professional
respectful.description: Engage in discussions with courtesy. Disagreements are fine, but personal attacks, harassment, hate speech, or discriminatory behavior will not be tolerated.

authentic.title: Be Authentic
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your organization honestly. Do not impersonate others or misrepresent your affiliations, products, or services. Authenticity is the foundation of trust in our supply chain.

relevant.title: Stay On-Topic and Add Value
relevant.description: Contribute to discussions in a meaningful way. Avoid spam, off-topic comments, and excessive promotion. Share your expertise and ask questions that benefit the community.

fairTrade.title: Transact with Integrity
fairTrade.description: All transactions conducted via the Marketplace or other services must be honored. Be clear in your listings, communicate promptly, and resolve disputes professionally. Fraudulent activity will result in an immediate ban.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainable Practices
sustainable.description: While we welcome all participants, we encourage discussions and listings that align with sustainable, regenerative, and ethical agricultural practices. Claims of certification (e.g., Organic, Fair Trade) must be verifiable.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you see content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our moderation team by using the in-app reporting tools or by emailing us at {emailLink}.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: By using DamDoh, you agree to these guidelines. Violations may result in content removal, warnings, or account suspension. Thank you for helping us build a trusted and valuable agricultural community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Here's how you can reach us.

sendMessage.title: Send us a Message
sendMessage.note: This is a non-functional form for demonstration purposes.

searchPage.title: DamDoh Search
searchPage.description: Find what you need across our entire agricultural ecosystem.

walletPage.title: My Wallet
walletPage.description: Manage your funds, view transaction history, and access financial services.
walletPage.underDevelopmentDescription: We are building a secure and seamless financial hub to empower your agricultural business. The DamDoh Wallet will enable you to:
walletPage.feature1: Securely send and receive payments on the platform.
walletPage.feature2: Manage your transaction history and account balance.
walletPage.feature3: Apply for loans and credit based on your platform activity.
walletPage.feature4: Access insurance products and other financial services.

industryNewsPage.title: Industry News & Trends
industryNewsPage.description: Stay informed with the latest updates, research, and analysis in the agricultural sector.

noNews.title: No News Found
noNews.description: There are currently no news articles available. Please check back later.

news1.title: Global Grain Prices Surge Amidst Supply Chain Disruptions
news1.excerpt: A combination of geopolitical tensions and adverse weather conditions has led to a significant increase in global grain prices, impacting food security in several regions.

news2.title: New EU Regulations on Sustainable Packaging to Impact Food Exporters
news2.excerpt: The European Union has introduced stricter regulations on packaging materials, pushing exporters to adopt more eco-friendly and recyclable solutions for food products.

news3.title: Report: Regenerative Agriculture Boosts Soil Health and Carbon Sequestration
news3.excerpt: A five-year study reveals that farms adopting regenerative practices have seen a 30% increase in soil organic matter and significant carbon capture capabilities.

traceabilityPage.title: Product Traceability
traceabilityPage.description: Trace the journey of your food from farm to shelf. Enter a Verifiable Traceability ID (VTI) to see the full history of a product batch.
traceabilityPage.vtiDescription: A VTI is a unique code assigned to each batch of produce.
traceabilityPage.recentDescription: This feature is coming soon. You'll be able to see your tracked items here.

detailPage.notFoundDescription: The VTI you entered could not be found. Please check the ID and try again.
detailPage.sustainablyGrownDescription: Based on logged events, this batch appears to have been grown using sustainable, organic-style inputs.
detailPage.journeyDescription: A timeline of events for this batch from farm to you.
detailPage.noEventDetails: No specific details were logged for this event.
detailPage.noEventsFound: No traceability events found for this batch.
